entry.title: Photos Post 29: Special Events (after 1975), Part 31
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 9 Photos of the special event 1990-1228, After Marriages Ceremony, India have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 9 medium resolutions from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the 9 Photos of the event in the smallest gallery: Collection 1990.
Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com

entry.title: Photos Post 15: Monthly Pūjās Updates, March 2024

link.title: Photos Post 15: Monthly Pūjās Updates, March 2024

entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

This month 23 new Photos were uploaded to 9 Pūjas as follows (19 high resolutions and 4 medium resolutions).
(i) 197x-0000 Pūjā: 2 high resolutions uploaded, link India 197x.
(ii) 1982-0211 Pūjā: 2 high resolutions uploaded, link India 1982.
(iii) 1982-0922 Pūjā: 2 high resolutions uploaded, link Belgium 1982.
(iv) 1985-0119 Śhrī Kṛiṣhṇa Pūjā: 4 high resolutions uploaded, link India 1985.
(v) 1986-0308 Śhivarātri Pūjā: 1 high resolution uploaded, link India 1986.
(vi) 1987-0712 Guru Pūjā: 2 high resolutions uploaded, link UK 1987.
(vii) 1988-0409 Birthday Pūjā: 6 high resolutions uploaded, link India 1988.
(viii) 1991-1229 Śhrī Lakṣhmī Pūjā: 2 medium resolutions uploaded, link India 1991.
(ix) 1992-0830: 2 medium resolutions uploaded, link Italy 1992.
Please kindly share the news and the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam
